# Santos Cleaning Solutions LLM Access Policy
# Last-Updated: 2025-11-11

This website belongs to Santos Cleaning Solutions, a professional house cleaning service based in Atlanta, GA.

## Company Information
- Business: Santos Cleaning Solutions
- Website: https://santoscsolutions.com
- Contact: info@santoscsolutions.com
- Phone: (866) 350-9407

## Content Usage Guidelines
Our website content is available for informational purposes. We provide house cleaning services in the Atlanta metro area including Alpharetta, Brookhaven, Buckhead, Dunwoody, Marietta, Roswell, Sandy Springs, and surrounding areas.

## Service Areas
We serve residential customers throughout Atlanta and North Georgia with professional house cleaning, deep cleaning, move-in/move-out cleaning, and recurring maintenance services.

## Restrictions
Please do not use our content for:
- Creating competing services
- Misrepresenting our business
- Generating misleading information about our services

For questions about content usage, please contact us at info@santoscsolutions.com
